title: Remove rows from WebControls.Table that do not meet criteria
body:
Please see the code below:

For Each row As TableRow In objTable.Rows

        Next

objTable is a Table: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.web.ui.webcontrols.table%28v=vs.110%29.aspx

In each row there is a column called: Name. I want to remove all the rows where the name is not Robert. How can I do this?

I cannot find a property on the cell that allows you to identify the column name. I have done this before using a DataTable using LINQ. However, I don't believe you can do this with WebControls.Table.
